data.title: Ornamentation in the Age of Algorithms and Robotics: Can Technology Bring Back Architectural Detail?
data.description: Delve into the debate surrounding architectural ornamentation's return—what does it mean for culture and design in today's society?
data.keywords: Architecture, Digital Fabrication, Modernism, Ornament, Ornamentation, Artificial Intelligence, Robotics, 3D Printing, Michael Hansmeyer, Studio Benjamin Dillenburger, article, Articles, Architecture, Cities, Architecture History, Craftsman
